data.name: Fire dust
data.effect: Causes fire damage like a Spitfire (8)

data.name: Chlorine gas
data.effect: Poisoned (5C, 1 Trauma per round, Potency -1 per round, successfully roll on BOD+Toughness (Potency) ends poisoning

data.name: Iron Club of the Cockroach Kings
Source
data.effect: Level equals maximum of the total module levels that can be fueled

data.name: Fumor
data.effect: Passive defense for 2 rounds +1 x level, level determines the number of charges

data.name: Greenlight
data.effect: 45° cone: target gets general +2 Difficulty, 2 rounds. Cool down 3 rounds

data.name: Discharge
data.effect: Defense: enemy takes 1 point of Ego damage per level, needs to recharge 2 rounds

data.name: Screamer
data.effect: Chases away pickpockets with high-frequency scream

data.name: Freon
data.effect: Attack: activation + AGI+Projectiles, +2D. Piercing (5), Damage 1 x level

data.name: Portable Uplink
data.effect: Throw antenna and establish Uplink: INT+Legends +2D, INT+Engineering +1D, Call Shutter ( 1 Renown )

data.name: Flint and tinder
data.effect: Tinder takes several minutes to ignite

data.name: Cyclops Eye
data.effect: No darkness penalty with Paler night vision, otherwise penalty -2

data.name: Cutting tool
data.effect: No attack tool, 20 points of damage per round to obstacles, 3 Slots

data.name: Arc welder
data.effect: 15 points of damage to obstacles, risk of tank being hit, detonation when at least 4 damage, 3 Slots

data.name: Tunnel Driller
data.effect: Concrete and rock: 10 points of damage per round, tank at risk, -6D in combat, 3 Slots

data.name: Breathing cloth
data.effect: Level 1: +1S when contaminated with spores, germs, and environmental toxins

data.name: Breathing apparatus
data.effect: Level 3: +3S, contains oxygen for 1 hour, then relapses to level 2

data.name: Bandage
data.effect: Right after taking the wound: recovery of 1 Flesh Wound

data.name: Apothecarium
data.effect: Substance analysis and drug production: INT+Science +1S x level, 10 doses

data.name: Sequencer
data.effect: Drug/poison is individualized: +2 Potency when applied to the target

data.name: Crucible
data.effect: Production of drugs or poisons: INT+Science +1D

data.name: Perat
data.effect: 4 hours: PSY+Faith/Willpower and INS+Perception +1D x level

data.name: Hiddekel
data.effect: 4 hours: INS+Primal and PSY+Reaction +1D x level

data.name: Gehon
data.effect: 4 hours: INT+Focus +1D x level, Trauma penalty -1D x level

data.name: Pischon
data.effect: 4 hours: CHA+Expression and PSY+Faith +1D x level

data.name: Styx
data.effect: 30 min: per combat round -1 point of damage per level, afterwards Trauma damage

data.name: Acheron
data.effect: Ether sight: level 1 = 10 m, level 2 = 100 m, level 3 = 300 m, afterwards spore infestation

data.name: Gauging material
data.effect: Gauges Noumenon Vocalizer or Mollusk to Chakra, Difficulty –Level

data.name: Blanket / sleeping bag
data.effect: Restful sleep: recover 1 Flesh Wound per night

data.name: Camo net
data.effect: For the resting place: harder to be spotted by enemies +2C

data.name: Antibiotics
data.effect: +2S x level to the resistance roll against bacterial infections

data.name: Antidote
data.effect: +2S x level to the resistance roll against poisoning

data.name: Narcotics
data.effect: Surgery preparation: Surgeon gets INT+Medicine +1D x level

data.name: Pain killers
data.effect: Negates the penalty of 2 x level points of Trauma

data.name: Stimulants
data.effect: PSY+Reaction +1D x level for several hours

data.name: Duat fruit
data.effect: Level 1-6: Anubians can catalyze fruit up to their rank level

data.name: Marduk oil
data.effect: Resistance against pheromantic influences +4S for 1 hour

data.name: Blood of Aries
data.effect: Regeneration of 1 wound per hour, 1 dose per day, Addictive

data.name: Lock pick
data.effect: Enables user to pick mechanical locks

data.name: Cataract
data.effect: Hums unpleasantly; interacts with Orbital; reads surroundings by ultrasound

data.name: Orbital
data.effect: Shows maps of the surroundings; can be updated with bunker positions

data.name: Arbiter
data.effect: Hacks RG systems: INT+Artifact Lore +2D; can activate and deactivate discs

data.name: Quantum
data.effect: Detects other Quantum discs, range depends on level

data.name: Quasar
data.effect: Solar collector; can charge other discs

data.name: Codex special edition
data.effect: 1 round of meditation: +1 Ego Point; CHA+Expression +2D

data.name: Soul stones
data.effect: Target is a believer: +1D to social interaction

data.name: Balancer
data.effect: When lost: +4D to any business endeavors against former owner

data.name: Balancer: lock
data.effect: The lock stops trespassers from searching; lock picking: AGI+Dexterity (5)

data.name: Balancer: trap
data.effect: Trespass: poison with Potency 5, -1 Ego Point per round; fades after 4 hours

data.name: Apocalyptic Tarot
data.effect: In the hand of the Raven: CHA+Leadership +1D

data.name: Icons
data.effect: Tied to foreseen Action: +2D to all Action rolls

data.name: Jehammed’s Teachings
data.effect: +2D to social interactions within the Cult

data.name: Jehammed’s Will/Aries‘s Blessing
data.effect: +4D to social interactions within the Cult

data.name: Bugs and surveillance equipment
data.effect: Hard to detect: AGI+Stealth +2 Successes when placing

data.name: Tool bag
data.effect: Upgradable (1-3). AGI+Crafting and AGI+Dexterity + 1D x level

data.name: Electronics tools
data.effect: Manipulate electrical devices: +1D to Action roll

data.name: Throwing Pulsor
data.effect: Destroys all electronics within 10 m radius

data.name: Backpack
data.effect: Encumbrance -2 for everything in the backpack; can be set down

data.name: Sleigh
data.effect: Encumbrance -3 for everything on the sleigh; can be left behind
